meanings.def: having drunk so much alcohol that it is impossible to think or speak clearly
examples: She was too drunk to remember anything about the party.
His only way of dealing with his problems was to go out and get drunk.
drunk on something They got drunk on vodka.
I was beginning to feel very drunk.
The wine had made her drunk.
By now I was pretty drunk on the free beer.

meanings.def: very excited, tired, etc. because of a particular emotion or situation
examples: She was almost drunk with all these new impressions.
He came home blind drunk, as usual.

meanings.def: behaving in a noisy or violent way in a public place because you are drunk
examples: Police arrested him for being drunk and disorderly.
He rolled home roaring drunk at 3 o’clock in the morning.
He came home blind drunk, as usual.

meanings.def: a person who is drunk or who often gets drunk
